name: web-music-player
description: 仿网易云音乐（mac 客户端）web 版，使用 Vue3 + Typescript + 网易云音乐 api 开发

scripts.install: cd front && npm install && cd ../server && npm install cd .. && exit 0
scripts.start: cd server && npm start & cd front && npm run dev
scripts.install-project: cd front-project && npm install && cd ../server && npm install cd .. && exit 0
scripts.start-project: cd server && npm start & cd front-project && npm run dev

author: 马克豚
